definitions.text: a harsh noise made by scraping
examples: the scrape of violin bows distracted her

definitions.text: an abraded area where the skin is torn or worn off
a deep bow with the foot drawn backwards (indicating excessive humility)
examples: all that bowing and scraping did not impress him
The cat scraped at the armchair
They scraped a letter into the stone

definitions.text: cut the surface of; wear away the surface of
bend the knees and bow in a servile manner
gather (money or other resources) together over time
examples: She had scraped together enough money for college

definitions.text: bruise, cut, or injure the skin or the surface of
examples: The boy skinned his knee when he fell
